Source.SQL: SELECT jg.dizhimc diqumc, jg.dizhibm dizhibm, jg.DiZhiBMOrder, huochan.num as huochan, zaochan.total as zaochanzs, zaochan.high as hrzaochan, zaochan.low as lrzaochan, zaochan.qy as zaochanqy, zaochan.zy as zaochanzy, zaochan.qt as zaochanqt, zaochan.sw as zaochansw FROM ( select dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder from GY_FUWUJG where HZStatisticsType = 2 group by dizhibm,dizhimc,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) jg left JOIN ( SELECT jg.dizhibm, count(*) AS num FROM cdh_deliveryrecord cdr LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG jg ON jg.FUWUJGBH = cdr.visitunitcode and jg.HZStatisticsType = 2 WHERE cdr.outcomeofpregnancy = '1' AND cdr.status = '1' and CONVERT(varchar(100), cdr.deliverydate, 23) >= @checkDayStart and CONVERT(varchar(100), cdr.deliverydate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@checkDayEnd) and jg.HZStatisticsType = 2 AND jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG where HZStatisticsType = 2 group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) GROUP BY jg.dizhibm ) huochan ON huochan.dizhibm = jg.dizhibm left JOIN ( SELECT jg.dizhibm, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01' then 1 else 0 end) as total, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '18' then 1 else 0 end) as high, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '01' then 1 else 0 end) as low, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '1' then 1 else 0 end) as qy, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '6' then 1 else 0 end) as zy, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '7' then 1 else 0 end) as qt, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '4' then 1 else 0 end) as sw FROM cc_generalinfo cg LEFT JOIN cc_highrisk ch ON cg.childid = ch.childid LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG jg ON jg.FUWUJGBH = cg.createUnit and jg.HZStatisticsType = 2 WHERE 1=1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.birthDay, 23) >= @checkDayStart and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.birthDay, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@checkDayEnd) and jg.HZStatisticsType = 2 and jg.dizhibm in ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG where HZStatisticsType = 2 group by dizhibm,DiZhiBMOrder order by DiZhiBMOrder asc @Pager ) GROUP BY jg.dizhibm ) zaochan ON zaochan.dizhibm = jg.dizhibm order by jg.DiZhiBMOrder
Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from ( select dizhibm from GY_FUWUJG where HZStatisticsType = 2 group by dizhibm )a
